analysis.description:
PreICO.manualTransfer (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol#434-441) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol#439)

PreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol#442-449) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol)

Reentrancy in PreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol#442-449):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol)

Reentrancy in PreICO.manualTransfer (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol#434-441):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(_to,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol#439)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balancesInCent (/unique_chucks/18/0x4dfc56b2613729878aa0a49c928fb41af62ccbef.sol#439-441)
